front.title: DSTM IPv4 over IPv6 tunnel profile for Tunnel Setup Protocol(TSP)

abstract.t: Based on the actions they perform, The network model presented inDSTM [1] defines three types of equipments: a DSTM server, DSTM nodesand a Tunnel End Point (TEPs). Within this model, a protocol isrequired for configuration data exchange among these equipments.This document presents a method to perform these actions based on TSP[2].
